resources.string: BAC - Basic Access Control for \n Passports
Can anyone read your Passport without you knowing it?
Can you read anyone\'s Passport without her knowing it?

No, thats not possible. You have to prove that you hold the Passport in hand, by sending the Passport No. and two dates written on the Passport. These data are known as BAC-Keys (Basic Access Control). ajmrtd allows you to store and manage different BAC-Keys for convenience.
Where can I get more information?
Info: Before we can talk to the Passport, we have to prove that we actually hold it in hand by sending these data.
